Test Name: Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) for Hereditary Disorders
Purpose: To detect genetic variants across the exome associated with hereditary disorders.
Container: DNA storage tube (e.g., labeled microcentrifuge tube)
Equipment: High-performance computing resources with analysis software (FastQC, BWA, SAMtools, GATK, Picard, ANNOVAR/SnpEff, IGV)
